otherNames: Sora wo Kakeru Shoujo, The Girl Who Leapt Through Space, 宇宙をかける少女
synopsis:
In the year 311 of the orbital calendar, humanity has migrated to countless colony clusters in space. Akiha Shishido encounters a malevolent artificial intelligence, Leopard, who has been installed on a colony.
She is joined by Inter-Colony-Police officer Itsuki Kannagi, taciturn young girl Honoka Kawai and a robot-potato, Imoko “Imo-chan” Shishido.
